learning_objectives.description: Use the language and notation of the following in appropriate contexts: proper fractions, improper fractions, mixed numbers, decimals, percentages.
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: Candidates are expected to be able to write fractions in their simplest form. Recurring decimal notation is required, e.g. 0.17 = 0.1777..., 0.123 = 0.1232323..., 0.123 = 0.123123...

learning_objectives.description: Recognise equivalence and convert between these forms.
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: Includes converting between recurring decimals and fractions and vice versa, e.g. write 0.17 as a fraction.
